conclusion: Violation of Art. 12;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF F.  v. SWITZERLAND - [Russian Translation]
